title: Taste of Shrewsbury
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out, British, Catering, English, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe with seating on 2 floors. Offers juices, smoothies, salads, jacket potatoes, soups (always vegan and gluten-free), panini and toasted sandwiches, cakes including vegan and gluten free ones. Prepares vegan food using separate boards and tongs. Hot sandwiches are toasted in their own bags to prevent contact with cheese/meat or allergens. Has Wi-Fi.
